nodes.bodyText: Is this a change from master?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -333,7 +333,8 @@ public void processOpts() {
                 .put("lowercase", new LowercaseLambda().generator(this))
                 .put("uppercase", new UppercaseLambda())
                 .put("titlecase", new TitlecaseLambda())
-                .put("camelcase", new CamelCaseLambda().generator(this))

nodes.bodyText: No, I added this to allow the default camelizebehaviour, i.e. uppercasing the first letter, to be available as lambda in the templates.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -333,7 +333,8 @@ public void processOpts() {
                 .put("lowercase", new LowercaseLambda().generator(this))
                 .put("uppercase", new UppercaseLambda())
                 .put("titlecase", new TitlecaseLambda())
-                .put("camelcase", new CamelCaseLambda().generator(this))

nodes.bodyText: Is this something we can just provide in any generator? Doesn't seem to be inversify specific.
Sure, if you think it is useful, I will add it.
